text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse @seanhannity @FoxNews Last 3 election stops - Oklahoma, Arizona and South Dakota. NO distancing, few masks. Now Oklahoma and Arizona experiencing dramatic Covid19 spikes. Just a coincidence..not likely. President is totally irresponsible. Only cares about election and votes. Its a freakin’ pandemic.
